TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DynamicScriptObject extends System.Dynamic.DynamicObject
Public NotInheritable Class DynamicScriptObject Inherits DynamicObject
public ref class DynamicScriptObject sealed : System::Dynamic::DynamicObject

Docs.summary: Enables calls from a XAML browser application (XBAP) to the HTML window that hosts the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Instances of this class are exposed through the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.HostScript%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper>.

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String
public: override System::String ^ ToString();
override this.ToString : unit -> string

Docs.summary: Attempts to convert the script object to a string representation.
Docs.returns: A string representation of the script object, if the object can be converted; otherwise, a string representation of the object's default property or method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the script object cannot be converted to a string, the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.DynamicScriptObject.ToString%2A> method returns a string representation of the default property or method.
